ygData.subject: The Quest for the Langseax
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone here done the Langseax quest?  Last night, I did this quest, to obtain one of the lovely Langseax swords for my warrior pal.  For those of you who
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone here done the Langseax quest? Last night, I did this quest, to
obtain one of the lovely Langseax swords for my warrior pal. For those of
you who don't know the quest, it's an upper 20s type of quest, and though
not particularly hard, it's certainly time consuming.

I did all the parts to the quest, obtained the final item (the murderer's
head), carefully sang my carrillon at the guy (who then regarded me
amiably), and gave him the head. To which he said, "Although the wolves of
the north bear you no ill will... blah blah blah NO SWORD FOR YOU!" (Okay,
that wasn't the exact dialog, but you get the idea).

Is it a warrior only quest or something? It didn't seem to be. Anyone else
had any experience with it?

Jyzan
